description: Supports integration with pre-trained Tensorflow models to accelerate annotation
Add and remove annotations with ease with individual edits or whole frame edits
Rectangle that serves as a point of refrence for training object detection AI models. This annotation can be coupled with behavior data.

altText: Keep track of multiple annotations accross frames
description: Full frame data summary helps keep track of multiple annotations by local and global id.
Supports videos from Local Files, Youtube, Vimeo and Dailymotion
